root: ^Hello, little one I am glad to see you are alive.
^The storm seems to have washed you downstream, it is a wonder you are alive.
^Hi, no I seem fine. . . just wet and tired. Where am I?
^A tiny isle in the stream I enjoy visiting. Sadly it seems to have been hit by the storm too. The lightning caused a fire. :(
^I am sorry to hear that and I wish I could help. But I need to get back home.
^I believe we can help one another. You help me to replant some of the lost plants and I will give you a ride across the water.
